title: Basic Fish Preparation for Cooking
brief: Properly clean and prepare fresh fish to maximize food value and prevent spoilage.
steps: Step 1: Prepare fish as soon as possible after catching.
Step 2: Cut out the gills and large blood vessels near the spine.
Step 3: Gut any fish longer than 10 centimeters by opening the belly and removing internal organs.
Step 4: Scale the fish by scraping against the grain, or skin it completely.
Step 5: Rinse the cleaned fish in clean water if available.
warnings: Fish spoils quickly, especially in hot weather - process immediately.
Save the juices when boiling fish with skin on for maximum nutrition.
Remove all blood vessels to prevent rapid spoilage.
